Articles.Content:
Helloooooooo,

I've finally joined the forums after about a million years of lurking about.

I have played KSP since 0.25 and somehow managed to get 984 hours of playing (according to Steam)

Looking forward to being a part of this great community!

Have a noice day!

Hello JaffaPadawan and welcome to the forum!

Come in from the cold, lurker.  We look forward to having you as a member of this great community.

Happy landings!
